formatDescription: An audiovisual container typically associated with 3G mobile phones and is developed by the Third Generation Partnership Project. May contain video/audio or audio only.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives
formatProvenance: 04/2024 (v.118)- Description created and notes added. Submitted by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints as part of PRONOM Research Week 2023.

internalSignatures.name: 3GPP Audio/Video File
internalSignatures.note: Header: The 4 letters 'ftyp' identifies the atom/box type as an ftyp box, the next 4 indicate the ftyp code for the "major brand". The brand sequence indicates the 'best use' of the file, and has several different profiles: basic, streaming-server, progressive-download, extended-presentation, media stream recording, file delivery, adaptive streaming.
